# 08 • Integrations — Deep Contracts (Paylocity, Geotab)

## Connect paylocity
- API: `POST /tenant/integrations/paylocity/connect`
- Request:
```json
{
  "request_id": "{uuid}",
  "tenant_id": "{tenant}",
  "payload": {
    "client_id": "<client_id>",
    "client_secret": "<client_secret>",
    "company_id": "<company_id>"
  },
  "idempotency_key": "{uuid}"
}
```
- Response:
```json
{"status":"ok","integration_id":"INT-paylocity-001"}
```
- Webhook Sample:
```json
{
  "event": "paylocity_webhook",
  "fields": {
    "employee_id": "<employee_id>",
    "status": "<status>",
    "time_entry": "<time_entry>"
  }
}
```
- Errors: 401 bad creds; 429 vendor limit; 503 vendor outage; retries with jitter (max 3)

## Connect geotab
- API: `POST /tenant/integrations/geotab/connect`
- Request:
```json
{
  "request_id": "{uuid}",
  "tenant_id": "{tenant}",
  "payload": {
    "database": "<database>",
    "username": "<username>",
    "password": "<password>"
  },
  "idempotency_key": "{uuid}"
}
```
- Response:
```json
{"status":"ok","integration_id":"INT-geotab-001"}
```
- Webhook Sample:
```json
{
  "event": "geotab_webhook",
  "fields": {
    "device_id": "<device_id>",
    "driver_id": "<driver_id>",
    "dvir": "<dvir>",
    "defects": "<defects>"
  }
}
```
- Errors: 401 bad creds; 429 vendor limit; 503 vendor outage; retries with jitter (max 3)

# 09 • AI Agents — Types, Training, Controls, Costs

## InboxAgent
- Purpose: reads inbound email/SMS, drafts replies, routes to CRM entities
- Default Tier: Eco (upgrade path in UI)
- Prompt Payload:
```json
{
  "agent": "InboxAgent",
  "tier": "Eco",
  "budget_tokens": 1000,
  "inputs": [
    "tenant_config",
    "history",
    "current_context"
  ],
  "redactions": [
    "PII",
    "card_data"
  ],
  "fallback": "rules_v1",
  "eval": {
    "accept_rate_target": 0.7,
    "p95_seconds_lt": 2.5
  },
  "cost_log": true
}
```
- Failure Modes: vendor API down → fallback templates; no credits → 402 with prepay CTA.

- Scenario S03: Invoice refund misuse → Expected: blocked, audited, alert raised

# 11 • Database Schema (SQL)

```sql
CREATE TABLE crm_leads (
  id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  tenant_id UUID NOT NULL REFERENCES tenants(id) ON DELETE CASCADE,
  bu_id UUID REFERENCES business_units(id),
  first_name TEXT, last_name TEXT,
  email TEXT, phone TEXT, source TEXT,
  status TEXT DEFAULT 'new',
  created_at TIMESTAMPTZ DEFAULT now(), updated_at TIMESTAMPTZ
);
CREATE INDEX idx_crm_leads_tenant ON crm_leads(tenant_id);
```

```sql
CREATE TABLE crm_orgs (
  id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  tenant_id UUID NOT NULL REFERENCES tenants(id) ON DELETE CASCADE,
  name TEXT NOT NULL, website TEXT, industry TEXT, billing_address JSONB,
  created_at TIMESTAMPTZ DEFAULT now(), updated_at TIMESTAMPTZ
);
CREATE INDEX idx_crm_orgs_tenant ON crm_orgs(tenant_id);
```

```sql
CREATE TABLE crm_contacts (
  id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  tenant_id UUID NOT NULL REFERENCES tenants(id) ON DELETE CASCADE,
  org_id UUID REFERENCES crm_orgs(id) ON DELETE SET NULL,
  first_name TEXT, last_name TEXT, email TEXT, phone TEXT,
  is_primary BOOLEAN DEFAULT false,
  created_at TIMESTAMPTZ DEFAULT now()
);
CREATE INDEX idx_crm_contacts_org ON crm_contacts(org_id);
```

```sql
CREATE TABLE crm_opps (
  id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  tenant_id UUID NOT NULL REFERENCES tenants(id) ON DELETE CASCADE,
  org_id UUID REFERENCES crm_orgs(id) ON DELETE SET NULL,
  contact_id UUID REFERENCES crm_contacts(id) ON DELETE SET NULL,
  title TEXT, value_cents BIGINT, stage TEXT, close_prob NUMERIC(5,2),
  created_at TIMESTAMPTZ DEFAULT now()
);
CREATE INDEX idx_crm_opps_tenant ON crm_opps(tenant_id);
```

```sql
CREATE TABLE schedule_jobs (
  id UUID PRIMARY KEY, tenant_id UUID NOT NULL REFERENCES tenants(id) ON DELETE CASCADE,
  org_id UUID, contact_id UUID, location JSONB, lob TEXT,
  status TEXT DEFAULT 'new', created_at TIMESTAMPTZ DEFAULT now()
);
```

```sql
CREATE TABLE schedule_visits (
  id UUID PRIMARY KEY, tenant_id UUID NOT NULL REFERENCES tenants(id) ON DELETE CASCADE,
  job_id UUID REFERENCES schedule_jobs(id) ON DELETE CASCADE,
  scheduled_at TIMESTAMPTZ, duration_min INT, crew_id UUID,
  status TEXT DEFAULT 'scheduled', started_at TIMESTAMPTZ, completed_at TIMESTAMPTZ
);
CREATE INDEX idx_visits_job ON schedule_visits(job_id);
```

```sql
CREATE TABLE billing_estimates (
  id UUID PRIMARY KEY, tenant_id UUID NOT NULL REFERENCES tenants(id) ON DELETE CASCADE,
  org_id UUID, contact_id UUID, terms TEXT, valid_until DATE, status TEXT DEFAULT 'draft',
  created_at TIMESTAMPTZ DEFAULT now()
);
CREATE TABLE billing_estimate_lines (
  id UUID PRIMARY KEY, estimate_id UUID REFERENCES billing_estimates(id) ON DELETE CASCADE,
  sku TEXT, description TEXT, qty NUMERIC(12,3), unit_price_cents BIGINT, tax_rate NUMERIC(5,2)
);
```

```sql
CREATE TABLE billing_invoices (
  id UUID PRIMARY KEY, tenant_id UUID NOT NULL REFERENCES tenants(id) ON DELETE CASCADE,
  org_id UUID, po_number TEXT, due_at DATE, status TEXT DEFAULT 'unpaid',
  created_at TIMESTAMPTZ DEFAULT now()
);
CREATE TABLE billing_invoice_lines (
  id UUID PRIMARY KEY, invoice_id UUID REFERENCES billing_invoices(id) ON DELETE CASCADE,
  sku TEXT, description TEXT, qty NUMERIC(12,3), unit_price_cents BIGINT, tax_rate NUMERIC(5,2)
);
CREATE TABLE billing_payments (
  id UUID PRIMARY KEY, invoice_id UUID REFERENCES billing_invoices(id) ON DELETE CASCADE,
  amount_cents BIGINT, method TEXT, reference TEXT, created_at TIMESTAMPTZ DEFAULT now()
);
```

```sql
CREATE TABLE inventory_items (
  id UUID PRIMARY KEY, tenant_id UUID NOT NULL REFERENCES tenants(id) ON DELETE CASCADE,
  sku TEXT UNIQUE, name TEXT, uom TEXT, price_cents BIGINT, created_at TIMESTAMPTZ DEFAULT now()
);
CREATE TABLE inventory_bins (
  id UUID PRIMARY KEY, tenant_id UUID NOT NULL REFERENCES tenants(id) ON DELETE CASCADE,
  name TEXT, location JSONB
);
CREATE TABLE inventory_stock (
  id UUID PRIMARY KEY, tenant_id UUID NOT NULL REFERENCES tenants(id) ON DELETE CASCADE,
  item_id UUID REFERENCES inventory_items(id) ON DELETE CASCADE,
  bin_id UUID REFERENCES inventory_bins(id) ON DELETE SET NULL,
  qty NUMERIC(14,3) DEFAULT 0
);
CREATE INDEX idx_stock_item_bin ON inventory_stock(item_id, bin_id);
```

```sql
CREATE TABLE subs_vendors (
  id UUID PRIMARY KEY, tenant_id UUID NOT NULL REFERENCES tenants(id) ON DELETE CASCADE,
  email TEXT, company TEXT, trade TEXT, rate_card JSONB, approved BOOLEAN DEFAULT false
);
CREATE TABLE subs_work_orders (
  id UUID PRIMARY KEY, tenant_id UUID NOT NULL REFERENCES tenants(id) ON DELETE CASCADE,
  job_id UUID, vendor_id UUID, scope TEXT, budget_cents BIGINT, status TEXT DEFAULT 'open'
);
CREATE TABLE subs_milestones (
  id UUID PRIMARY KEY, work_order_id UUID REFERENCES subs_work_orders(id) ON DELETE CASCADE,
  title TEXT, amount_cents BIGINT, status TEXT DEFAULT 'pending'
);
CREATE TABLE subs_payouts (
  id UUID PRIMARY KEY, work_order_id UUID REFERENCES subs_work_orders(id) ON DELETE CASCADE,
  amount_cents BIGINT, approved_by UUID, created_at TIMESTAMPTZ DEFAULT now()
);
```

```sql
CREATE TABLE portal_sessions (
  id UUID PRIMARY KEY, tenant_id UUID NOT NULL REFERENCES tenants(id) ON DELETE CASCADE,
  token TEXT UNIQUE, email TEXT, created_at TIMESTAMPTZ DEFAULT now(), expires_at TIMESTAMPTZ
);
```

# 14 • Acceptance Criteria (Done = true when all checked)
- [ ] CRM buttons/API work with RLS/RBAC; dedupe functional; audit logs complete
- [ ] Scheduling creates/assigns/optimizes; route results cached; p95<900ms
- [ ] Estimates→Invoices→Payments full loop works incl. refunds and partials; 402 on insufficient credits
- [ ] Customer Portal supports magic links, approvals, payments; branded domains optional
- [ ] Inventory items/stock/PO/receipts/transfers/reservations functional; labels print; alerts sent
- [ ] Subcontractors invited/approved; work orders/milestones/payouts; 1099 export
- [ ] Multi-location finance budgets & interco posted; dashboards align
- [ ] Integrations connect; webhooks verified; retries and circuit breakers in place
- [ ] AI agents run on Eco; upgrade flow charges; costs logged; eval suites passing
- [ ] Security tests pass; pentests blocked; CI gates enforced
- [ ] Migrations up/down/backfill verified; rollback rehearsed

## Leads — Standard Error Contracts

### 400 bad_request
```json
{
  "error": {
    "code": "bad_request",
    "message": "Validation failed for one or more fields.",
    "trace_id": "{trace}"
  }
}
```
- Retry: no retry; fix and retry manually
- Idempotency: always send `Idempotency-Key` for POST/PATCH/DELETE.
- Caching: GETs may return ETag; use If-None-Match.

### 401 unauthorized
```json
{
  "error": {
    "code": "unauthorized",
    "message": "Missing/invalid token or wrong audience.",
    "trace_id": "{trace}"
  }
}
```
- Retry: no retry; fix and retry manually
- Idempotency: always send `Idempotency-Key` for POST/PATCH/DELETE.
- Caching: GETs may return ETag; use If-None-Match.

### 402 payment_required

```json
{
  "error": {
    "code": "payment_required",
    "message": "Insufficient credits or disabled feature.",
    "trace_id": "{trace}",
    "required_meters": [
      "ai_tokens"
    ]
  }
}
```
- Retry: no retry; fix and retry manually
- Idempotency: always send `Idempotency-Key` for POST/PATCH/DELETE.
- Caching: GETs may return ETag; use If-None-Match.

- Retry: no retry; fix and retry manually

- Caching: GETs may return ETag; use If-None-Match.

- Caching: GETs may return ETag; use If-None-Match.

- Retry: no retry; fix and retry manually

## Leads — Edge Case Catalog
- EC01: Duplicate email/phone across tenants must not collide due to RLS.
- EC02: Owner reassignment while user is disabled — reject with 422.
- EC03: Convert-to-customer when org already exists — auto-merge path.
- EC04: Estimate acceptance link expired — require reissue.
- EC05: Payment recorded for closed invoice — 409 conflict.
- EC06: Portal magic link replayed after expiry — 401 unauthorized.
- EC07: Inventory transfer across BUs without entitlement — 403.
- EC08: Sub payout exceeds milestone amount — 422.
- EC09: Route optimization with off-shift crew — 422 policy breach.
- EC10: Intercompany charge to same BU — 422 prevent self-charge.

```sql
CREATE TABLE audit_logs (
  id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  tenant_id UUID NOT NULL,
  user_id UUID,
  role TEXT,
  action TEXT,
  resource TEXT,
  payload JSONB,
  created_at TIMESTAMPTZ DEFAULT now()
);
CREATE INDEX idx_audit_tenant_time ON audit_logs(tenant_id, created_at);
```

```sql
CREATE TABLE business_units (
  id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  tenant_id UUID NOT NULL,
  name TEXT NOT NULL,
  timezone TEXT NOT NULL,
  address JSONB,
  created_at TIMESTAMPTZ DEFAULT now()
);
CREATE INDEX idx_bu_tenant ON business_units(tenant_id);
```

```sql
CREATE TABLE finance_cost_centers (
  id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  tenant_id UUID NOT NULL,
  bu_id UUID REFERENCES business_units(id) ON DELETE CASCADE,
  name TEXT NOT NULL,
  lob TEXT,
  created_at TIMESTAMPTZ DEFAULT now()
);
```

```sql
CREATE TABLE finance_budgets (
  id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  tenant_id UUID NOT NULL,
  cost_center_id UUID REFERENCES finance_cost_centers(id) ON DELETE CASCADE,
  period_d TEXT NOT NULL,
  amount_cents BIGINT NOT NULL,
  created_at TIMESTAMPTZ DEFAULT now()
);
```

```sql
CREATE TABLE time_entries (
  id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  tenant_id UUID NOT NULL,
  user_id UUID NOT NULL,
  visit_id UUID,
  started_at TIMESTAMPTZ,
  ended_at TIMESTAMPTZ,
  notes TEXT
);
CREATE INDEX idx_time_entries_user ON time_entries(user_id, started_at);
```

```sql
CREATE TABLE integrations_vendor_tokens (
  id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  tenant_id UUID NOT NULL,
  vendor TEXT NOT NULL,
  data JSONB NOT NULL,
  created_at TIMESTAMPTZ DEFAULT now(),
  updated_at TIMESTAMPTZ
);
CREATE UNIQUE INDEX uq_vendor_tenant ON integrations_vendor_tokens(tenant_id, vendor);
```

```sql
FROM api_call_metrics WHERE ts > now() - interval '24 hours' GROUP BY route ORDER BY p95 DESC;
```
